department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by Wednesday, April 19, 2023 at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Public Safety Canada (PS) is seeking a lead advertising and creative agency
duration_in_months: Limited to the contract period, or 12 months whichever is less.
